overview: Collection of two short films from Nova. "Jocking Around" — Handsome, hunky Brian Hawks tries hard to ignore his hunky teammates. But the ass-grabbing play soon turns ass-fucking serious! "Jock Itch" — Tige McMasters has Jock Itch... in the best way possible! It can only be cured by the sight, smell and taste of the coach's well-used jockstrap. Later that night, the still hot-to-trot kid drops by the coach's house for a surprise visit.
title: Lockerroom Fever
